post.summary: Performs authentication to access to the SORACOM API.
post.description: Performs authentication to access to the SORACOM API. To perform authentication by a root account, specify `email` and `password`. To perform authentication by an AuthKey, specify `authKeyId` and `authKey`. To perform authentication by a SAM user, specify `operatorId`, `userName` and `password`. An API Key and an API Token will be included in the response if successful. Specify the API Key and the API Token to requests afterwards

post.summary: Issues a password reset token for the operator.
post.description: Generates a password reset token and send it to the operator's mail address. After receiving the password reset token, call /v1/auth/password_reset_token/verify API with the token to update operator's password.

post.summary: Verifies the password reset token and updates password.
post.description: Updates the operator's password if the password reset token is verified.

404.description: Token expired.

get.description: Returns a list of credentials.

post.description: Creates a new credential.

400.description: There was an error in the request or the specified token has already expired. (In the latter case, you will need to use the /auth API to do authentication once again.)

404.description: Not Found

post.description: Makes a request to create a new operator. An e-mail is sent to the e-mail address specified in the parameters, containing a one-time token for verifying the operatorâ€™s registration.

400.description: The e-mail address is already registered or the password has an incorrect format.

post.description: Sends an e-mail with a one-time token for executing the e-mail address change.
Verifies the token for the e-mail address change, and then changes the e-mail address.
Verifies the operator's registration. Called by setting as parameter the one-time verification token received via e-mail.

404.description: The one-time token has expired.

get.description: Returns information about the operator.
Returns the operator's AuthKey list.

post.description: Generates an AuthKey for the operator.

delete.description: Deletes an AuthKey from the operator.

post.description: Updates the operator's password.
Returns a token for accessing the support console.

Generates a new API token. If you insert the current API token into the header and make a request, a response is returned containing the new API token. You can then use the new API token in future requests.

400.description: There was an error in the request or the specified token has already expired. (In the latter case, you will need to use the /auth API to do authentication once again.)

delete.description: Detaches a role from a user.

get.description: Retrieves the SAM user's permissions.

Returns a list of subscribers that match a certain criteria. If the total number of subscribers does not fit in one page, a URL for accessing the next page is returned in the 'Link' header of the response.

parameters.name: tag_name
parameters.description: Tag name for filtering the search (exact match).

parameters.name: tag_value
parameters.description: Tag search string for filtering the search. Required when `tag_name` has been specified.

parameters.name: status_filter
parameters.description: Status for filtering the search. Can specify multiple values delimited by `|`. Valid values include: `active`, `inactive`, `ready`, `instock`, `shipped`, `suspended`, and `terminated`.

parameters.name: speed_class_filter
parameters.description: Speed class for filtering the search. Can specify multiple values delimited by `|`. Valid values include: `s1.minimum`, `s1.slow`, `s1.standard`, `s1.fast`

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of subscribers to retrieve.

parameters.name: last_evaluated_key
parameters.description: The IMSI of the last subscriber retrieved on the current page. By specifying this parameter, you can continue to retrieve the list from the next subscriber onward.

post.description: Registers a subscriber.

get.description: Returns information about the specified subscriber.

404.description: The specified subscriber does not exist.

post.description: Changes the speed class of the specified subscriber.

200.description: The subscriber's detailed information after the update.

404.description: The specified subscriber does not exist.

post.description: Deletes session for the specified subscriber.

200.description: The subscriber's detailed information after the update.

404.description: The specified subscriber does not exist.

post.description: Activates status of specified subscriber.

200.description: The subscriber's detailed information after the update.

404.description: The specified subscriber does not exist.

post.description: Deactivates specified subscriber.

200.description: The subscriber's detailed information after the update.

404.description: The specified subscriber does not exist.

post.description: Terminates the specified subscriber

200.description: The subscriber's detailed information after the update.

404.description: The specified subscriber does not exist.

post.description: Enables termination of specified subscriber.

200.description: The subscriber's detailed information after the update.

404.description: The specified subscriber does not exist.

post.description: Disables termination of specified subscriber.

200.description: The subscriber's detailed information after the update.

404.description: The specified subscriber does not exist.

post.description: Updates expiry time of specified subscriber.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Expiry time after the update (unixtime: in milliseconds).

200.description: The subscriber's detailed information after the update.

404.description: The specified subscriber does not exist.

post.description: Deletes expiry time of specified subscriber and changes it to indefinite.

204.description: Change of specified subscriber's expiry time to indefinite complete.

404.description: The specified subscriber does not exist or the subscriber does not have an expiry time.

post.description: Sets or overwrites a group for the specified subscriber.

200.description: The subscriber's detailed information after the update.

404.description: The specified subscriber does not exist.

post.description: Removes the group configuration from the specified subscriber.

200.description: The subscriber's detailed information after the update.

404.description: The specified subscriber does not exist or the subscriber does not belong to a group.

get.description: Returns the event history for the specified subscriber, including session creation, change, and deletion. If the total number of events does not fit in one page, a URL for accessing the next page is returned in the `Link` header of the response.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start time for the events search range.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End time for the events search range.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of events to retrieve.

parameters.name: last_evaluated_key
parameters.description: The time stamp of the last event retrieved on the current page. By specifying this parameter, you can continue to retrieve the list from the next event onward.

put.summary: Bulk Insert or Update Subscriber Tags.
put.description: Inserts/updates tags for the specified subscriber.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Array of tags to be inserted/updated.

200.description: The subscriber's detailed information after the update.

404.description: The specified subscriber does not exist.

delete.description: Deletes a tag from the specified subscriber.

parameters.name: tag_name
parameters.description: Tag name to be deleted. (This will be part of a URL path, so it needs to be percent-encoded. In JavaScript, specify the name after it has been encoded using encodeURIComponent().)

404.description: The specified subscriber or the tag does not exist.

post.description: Sends the subscriber's inter-operator control transfer token to the control destination operator.
Verifies the subscriber's control transfer token, and executes the transfer. This API is called from the operator of the control destination.

delete.description: Deletes the subscriber's inter-operator control transfer token, and cancels the control transfer.

404.description: The token does not exist.

get.description: Returns past billing history (after applied discounts such as free tiers, etc., inclusive of tax). This API only returns the billing amounts that have been finalized at the end of the month.
Returns the latest billing amounts after applied discounts such as free tiers, etc. The amounts retrieved using this API correspond to the values before the invoice was finalized.

post.summary: Output latest billing CSV file to S3.
post.description: Returns detailed information of the billing amounts for the latest month. This detailed information includes billing amounts per day, subscriber, and billing item. The amounts retrieved using this API correspond to the values before the invoice was finalized.

get.description: Returns the billing history for the specified month (after applied discounts such as free tiers, etc., inclusive of tax). The amounts retrieved using this API correspond to the values before the invoice was finalized.
Returns detailed information of billing amounts per day for the specified month. This API only returns the billing amounts that have been finalized.

post.summary: Output billing CSV file to S3.
post.description: Returns detailed information for the billing amounts for the specified month. This detailed information includes billing amounts per day, subscriber, and billing item.

get.description: Returns a list of currently registered coupons.

post.description: Registers a coupon.

get.description: Returns result of a payment transaction.
Returns current payment methods. Detailed information is included in the properties.

post.description: Activates a current payment method that has an error.

post.summary: Register credit card information for WebPay.
post.description: Registers credit card information for WebPay payments.

get.description: Returns a list of event handlers.

post.description: Creates a new event handler.

get.summary: List Event Handlers related to Subscriber.
get.description: Returns a list of event handlers related to the specified IMSI.
Returns information about the specified event handler.

404.description: Handler not found.
EventHandler not found.

post.description: Adds a setting for ignoring the specified event handler of the specified IMSI.

delete.description: Deletes the setting for ignoring the specified event handler of the specified IMSI.

404.description: not found

get.description: Returns a list of confirmed orders.

post.description: Creates a new order quotation. If the orderId is put in /confirm, the order is complete.

get.description: Returns a confirmed order.

put.description: Cancels an order. If the order has already been dispatched, an error is returned.
Performs a credit limit and confirms the order if no problems are encountered.

post.description: Registers the ordered SIM with the operator.

get.description: List ordered subscribers

parameters.name: last_evaluated_key
parameters.description: Serial number of the last subscriber in the previous page that is set to response header with X-Soracom-Next-Key.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of subscribers in a response.

get.description: Returns a list of products.

get.summary: Get Air Usage Report of Subscriber.
get.description: Retrieves the usage report for the subscriber specified by the IMSI.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start time in unixtime for the aggregate data.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End time in unixtime for the aggregate data.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Units of aggregate data. For minutes, the interval is every 5 minutes.

get.summary: Get Beam Usage Report of Subscriber.
get.description: Retrieves the Soracom Beam usage report for the subscriber specified by the IMSI.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start time in unixtime for the aggregate data.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End time in unixtime for the aggregate data.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Units of aggregate data. For minutes, the interval is every 5 minutes.

post.summary: Export Air Usage Report of All Subscribers.
post.description: Retrieves a file containing the usage report of all subscribers for the specified operator. The report data range is specified with from, to in unixtime. The report contains monthly data. The file output destination is AWS S3. The file output format is CSV.

post.summary: Export Beam Usage Report of All Subscribers.
post.description: Retrieves a file containing the usage report of all subscribers for the specified operator. The report data range is specified with from, to in unixtime. The report contains monthly data. The file output destination is AWS S3. The file output format is CSV.

get.description: Returns a list of groups.

parameters.name: tag_name
parameters.description: Tag name of the group. Filters through all groups that exactly match the tag name. When tag_name is specified, tag_value is required.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results per response page.

parameters.name: last_evaluated_key
parameters.description: The last Group ID retrieved on the current page. By specifying this parameter, you can continue to retrieve the list from the next group onward.

post.description: Create a new group.

get.description: Returns the group specified by the group ID.

404.description: The specified group does not exist.

delete.description: Deletes the specified group by group ID

parameters.name: limit

parameters.name: last_evaluated_key
parameters.description: The IMSI of the last subscriber retrieved on the current page. By specifying this parameter, you can continue to retrieve the list from the next subscriber onward.

404.description: The specified group does not exist.

parameters.description: Array of values for target object to be updated.

parameters.name: tag_name
parameters.description: Tag name to be deleted. (This will be part of a URL path, so it needs to be percent-encoded. In JavaScript, specify the name after it has been encoded using encodeURIComponent().)

get.description: Returns a list of VPGs.

parameters.name: tag_name
parameters.description: Tag name of the VPG. Filters through all VPGs that exactly match the tag name. When tag_name is specified, tag_value is required.

parameters.description: Maximum number of results per response page.

parameters.name: last_evaluated_key
parameters.description: The last group ID retrieved on the current page. By specifying this parameter, you can continue to retrieve the list from the next VPG onward.
